# Bennies (Фишки) Reference

> The meta-currency system for player agency and luck management.

---

## Earning Bennies

- **3 per session** (all unspent expire at end)
- GM awards extras for: creative problem-solving, dramatic roleplaying (especially Hindrances), heroic actions
- **Joker Gift**: When any player draws a Joker in combat → **all** players get a Benny
- **Edges**: Some edges provide additional bennies for session

---

## Spending Bennies

| Cost | Effect |
|------|--------|
| 1 Benny | **Reroll** any trait check (keep better, unless new roll is Critical Failure) |
| 1 Benny | **Recover from Shaken** instantly (even during enemy's turn) |
| 1 Benny | **Soak Roll** (Vigor check to negate wounds) |
| 1 Benny | **Draw new Action Card** (in addition to normal card; pick best) |
| 1 Benny | **Reroll damage** (all dice, including bonus die from Raise) |
| 1 Benny | **Recover 5 Power Points** (for Arcane Background characters) |
| 1 Benny | **Influence story** (at GM discretion — find clues, lucky coincidence) |

---

## GM Bennies

- GM gets 1 per player at session start
- Each Wild Card NPC gets 2 personal Bennies when introduced
- Joker drawn by enemies → +1 to all enemy pools and +1 per enemy Wild Card
